yes  all income sources. if combined annual above $22k  is taxable.

Delivery Driver (Freelance) x 10 - 38167üí∞ Salary$20 - $24 / hourlyüìù Employment TypePart-Timeüè¢ CompanyLIVINGMENU SG PTE. LTD.üìç LocationUbi Avenue 3  Singapore‚úèÔ∏è Job Requirements‚Ä¢ Possess Class 3 or 3A driving license with own or rented vehicle (Car / COE vehicle or Van).‚Ä¢ Familiar with mobile GPS app.‚Ä¢ All new applicants must attend 1 hour training in our office (Vertex at Ubi) for operations and apps briefing.‚Ä¢ Every driver will be issued food containers and a trolley.‚Ä¢ Pick up and deliver food in timely manner.‚Ä¢ Advantage:‚Ä¢ Attractive Incentive: Every 50 shifts give you additional $500.00‚Ä¢ Additional add on for more collection / pick up.‚Ä¢ Work during off peak hours for PHV or after sending kids‚Ä¢ Use rental or your own vehicle. COE cars welcome.‚Ä¢ Parking claimable above a minimum amount‚Ä¢ Freelance ‚Äì Flexible schedule; simply let us know your availability 1 week in advance‚Ä¢ Know where your delivery stops One night before‚Ä¢ Your shift can end early as soon as you finish your deliveries‚Ä¢ All delivery stops are sequenced and routed for your convenience.üìù Job Description‚Ä¢ Livingmenu is one of the largest pre-order based food delivery platforms in Singapore. We pick up food from vendors  typically hawkers and deliver to customers in specific areas.‚Ä¢ Position:‚Ä¢ Delivery Driver (Freelance) x 10‚Ä¢ Our Package:‚Ä¢ Allowance: S$60.00 per meal shift; 3 hours (Lunch or Dinner)‚Ä¢ Incentive: Every 50 shifts give you $500.00 additional...Read moreIf you have questions about this job  please click on apply.
